thumb.title: 2人乗りの戦闘機って1人だけ脱出できるの？
thumb.description: 射出レバーのお話！https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm43581322引用・参考資料等https://psemc.com/products/explosive-sequence-control/https://info.publicintelligence.net/HAF-F16.pdfhttps://www.quora.com/What-would-happen-if-just-one-of-the-occupants-of-a-modern-two-seater-jet-pulls-the-eject-handle-Will-both-fly-out-simultaneously-or-would-both-have-to-individually-eject
thumb.last_res_body: よくしらべたな F-111のように操縦... A-6イントルーダー... 並列複座（横並び... WSOの丸焼き一丁あ...
thumb.user_nickname: ゆっくり提督とれとろーらーちゃん
